section2.title: Make it stand out
section2.paragraph1: At Ilio, we believe wellness should be accessible, beautiful, and transformative. Our contemporary saunas combine Scandinavian craftsmanship with modern design principles.
section2.paragraph2: Each sauna is precision-engineered from sustainably sourced Western Red Cedar and fitted with advanced heating systems for an experience that lasts.

features.title: Doors and Windows
features.description: Tempered glass, cedar frame, premium hardware

features.title: Heater
features.description: 9 kW HUUM DROP, Red Dot Award winner

features.title: Smart Control / App
features.description: Start from anywhere, ready when you are

section5.guaranteeDescription: We're so confident you'll love your Ilio sauna that we offer a full 30-day trial. If you're not experiencing deeper sleep, less stress, and that post-sauna glow—we'll arrange pickup and issue a complete refund. No questions, no hassle.
guaranteeFeatures: Keep all accessories as our gift
section5.guaranteeNote: *In 3 years, we've had exactly 2 returns. Both customers bought larger models.

faqItems.question: Do I need a building permit?
faqItems.answer: Most municipalities don't require permits for structures under 108 sq ft. We provide all documentation needed for your local bylaws.

faqItems.question: Can my electrician handle the wiring?
faqItems.answer: Yes! Any licensed electrician can install the 40A/240V connection. We include detailed wiring diagrams and offer free phone support.

faqItems.question: How much maintenance is required?
faqItems.answer: Almost none. Wipe benches monthly, oil exterior annually. The HUUM heater self-cleans with each use. Total: 20 minutes/year.

section5.contactLinkText: Have a different question? Chat with an expert →
